title: New: Mannequins on 7th Street – In Two
body:
Belgium via London duo **Mannequins on 7th Street** cropped up towards the end of last summer with their intoxicating brand of smooth electronic-pop, and have spent the last six months or so refining their sound.

New release, _In Two_, is another sleek, fragile number, showcasing their dense, diverse sound, alongside their ability to pen a killer chorus. Check out In Two below, lifted from an EP out in September.
